events.message: I received my order yesterday, but one of the items is incorrect and I would like to request a refund.
The case has been categorized under Refund as the customer is requesting money back for a wrong item.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the incorrect item and your order number to proceed with your refund?
I have attached the photo of the item I received and my order number is 123456. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation email.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the prompt refund processing and look forward to your confirmation.
We have successfully initiated your refund. You should see the credited amount in your account shortly.
We wanted to check in to confirm if you received your refund and if everything is now satisfactory.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for your help and support.
The refund case has been closed as the customer confirmed successful receipt of the refund.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.
